name: zenZEC
description: Privacy and performance rarely meet in crypto. Zcash built one of the most trusted privacy assets in the world, while Solana became the fastest, most composable layer for decentralized finance. With zenZEC, those worlds finally converge, bringing ZEC’s legacy of privacy to Solana’s high-speed DeFi ecosystem. Built on Zenrock’s Decentralized Custody Token (DCT) standard and secured by dMPC (Distributed Multi-Party Computation) custody, zenZEC is a fully 1:1 backed wrapped ZEC designed for transparency, scalability, and productivity on Solana.
